entry.def: An allegorical story, poem, or painting uses allegory.

example.ex: Every Russian knows the allegorical novel The Master And Margarita.
example.tran: 每个俄罗斯人都知道这本寓言式小说，《大师和玛格丽特》。

means.word_mean: 1. used in or characteristic of or containing allegory;
